sources.name: A
sources.query: collect(taggify(1, k8s-object, "nodes"), taggify(1, k8s-object, "pods"), taggify(1, k8s-object, "containers"))

sources.name: A
sources.query: count(align(60s, mean, mcount(5m, ts("kubernetes.node.memory.usage" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}"))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: count(align(60s, mean, count(ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.usage" and org="acme-bank" and cluster="${cluster_name}"), cluster, namespace_name)))

sources.name: pod_count
sources.query: sum(align(60s, mean, msum(60s, ts("kubernetes.cluster.pod.count" and org="acme-bank" and cluster="${cluster_name}"))))

sources.name: container_count
sources.query: sum(align(60s, msum(60s, ts("kubernetes.cluster.pod_container.count" and org="acme-bank" and cluster="${cluster_name}"))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: avg(align(60s, mean, ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_utilization" and org="acme-bank" , cluster="${cluster_name}"))) * 100

sources.name: Source
sources.query: ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.usage" and org="acme-bank" , cluster="${cluster_name}") / ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}")

sources.name: Source
sources.query: sum(align(60s, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.pod.count" and org="acme-bank" , cluster="${cluster_name}")), namespace_name)

sources.name: Source
sources.query: sum(align(60s, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.pod_container.count" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}")), namespace_name)

sources.name: Source
sources.query: limit(250, ts("kubernetes.node.memory.working_set" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}") / ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_capacity" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}") * 100)

charts.name: File System - Available Storage by Node

sources.name: Source
sources.query: limit(250, ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.limit" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}") - ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.usage" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}"))

sources.name: Source
sources.query: limit(250, ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.usage" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}")  / ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.limit" and org="acme-bank", cluster="${cluster_name}") * 100)

charts.name: Memory Page Faults Rate By Pod
CPU Usage Rate By Pod Container
Memory Page Faults Rate By Pod Container
File System Usage By Pod Container

chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent: **Note:** *This dashboard is provided by Wavefront. It's not directly editable, which lets us deploy new versions without affecting any of your customizations. If you want to make your own version, click ![pencil](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/pen-icon.png) **> Clone** and give the dashboard a new URL*.
